title: Browse Web
description: Navigate web pages, extract structured data, and interact with web forms using AI-driven browser automation
author: Jarvis Inc

commands.name: navigate
commands.description: Navigate to a URL and perform instructions on the page

parameters.name: instructions
parameters.description: Natural language instructions for what to do on the page (e.g. 'click the pricing tab and read the enterprise plan')

returns.description: Page content with extracted text, screenshots, and action results

commands.name: extract_data
commands.description: Extract structured data from a web page based on a schema

parameters.name: url
parameters.description: The URL to extract data from

parameters.name: schema
parameters.description: JSON schema defining the structure of data to extract (field names and types)

returns.description: Extracted data matching the provided schema, with confidence scores per field

commands.name: fill_form
commands.description: Navigate to a page and fill out a form with provided data

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Key-value pairs mapping form field labels or names to values to fill in

returns.description: Form submission result with success status, confirmation message, and any validation errors
